name: OverHerd
description:
This game requires the use of Bose Frames or BoseAR wearable tech.

In OverHerd you play an English nobleman in charge of an over-enthusiastic catapult unit. Your assignment? Demolish the wall of your enemy’s castle by firing livestock at it. The challenge? You have to do it in the dark of night using only sound to guide you. Aim using the directional technology in your Bose AR wearable tech. Score three hits before sunrise and the enemy walls will be breached allowing your army to successfully assault the castle!

For additional information on OverHerd and W&M, please visit our website at: www.worthingandmoncrieff.com.
